text.section: The conduct declared unlawful in this section does not include any incidental interference arising from lawful activity by private land users or users of land managed by the Department, including farmers, miners, or persons engaged in recreation.

A Natural Resources police officer or other police officer of the State who has probable cause to believe that a person has violated this section may:
Order the person to desist or to leave the area; or
Arrest the person who refuses to desist or to leave the area.
